topic.title: Financial Tsunami is on the way …

1602038108_1N51mAhuByPNmLdzzyaYXN1G4XUkQ.body:
The earlier analysis was done mainly based on the event of Donald Trump hit by the coronavirus, and the over-speculated digit bubble in American economy. 
The recent plummet of Dow Jones is mainly caused by panic on the coronavirus, right?

邪惡盛行的唯一條件，是善良者的袖手旁觀。 — 埃德蒙·伯克
